_meta.instructions: Copy this file and fill in reviews, then run: npm run reviews:fetch -- --manual <your-file>.json
notes: showId must match an ID in data/shows.json
outlet should match an outlet in scripts/critic-reviews-agent/config.ts
rating can be: stars (4/5), letter (B+), or bucket (Positive)
assignedScore overrides rating normalization if provided
